jobs.title: Technology Platform lead
jobs.description:
Skills required:

An experienced full stack technical development and design/architecture lead with the following demonstrable technical expertise:
•	Fintech / start-up technology lead experience (7-10 years)
•	Mobile application development and deployment (ioS, android)
•	Java and JavaScript frameworks
•	Front end interface design experience (React, React Native, HTML5,)
•	DB technologies (Postgres, sql, mongo..)
•	Google Cloud platform and toolsets development experience (eg Firebase)
•	Data security best practice design and implementation
•	Interface methodologies (REST in particular)
•	Designing architecture from scratch (lead decision making on appropriate tech stack)
•	Agile build and principles of quality engineering
•	Proficient in use and configuration of Agile dev project tools (GitHub/Bitbucket, JIRA, Confluence, Slack)
•	Management of a development team – remote or onsite and business stakeholders of all levels
•	Production application quality control and release management 
•	Thrives in a small organisation set up and working approach
•	Experience managing vendors and vendor product integration


Ideal experience (good to have):
•	UX design and build
•	Financial Services / Wealth mgt industry experience


Personal qualities:
•	Great communications (cross stakeholders and customers)
•	Flexible / adaptive team player
•	Comfortable with Strategy and detail (this is a sleeves rolled up role, as well as leading the journey)
•	Demonstrated passion, perseverance and goal orientation
